NameSpaces

try to mix oranges and apples
apple 2
apple 3
apple 4
orange 1
orange 2
orange 3
orange 4
apple 5
apple 6
apple 7
apple 8
mixed 1
mixed 2
mixed 3
mixed 4
      
dragularService([$element.children()[0], $element.children()[2]], {
  nameSpace: 'apples'
});
dragularService($element.children()[1], {
  nameSpace: 'oranges'
});
dragularService($element.children()[3], { // mixed
  nameSpace: ['oranges', 'apples']
});
